thread.title: Man arrested at Heathrow Airport on suspicion of preparing terrorist attacks
thread.title_full: Man arrested at Heathrow Airport on suspicion of preparing terrorist attacks

author: Telegraph Reporters
title: Man arrested at Heathrow Airport on suspicion of preparing terrorist attacks
text:
A 36-year-old man has been arrested on suspicion of preparing terrorist acts, police said.
Counter-terrorism detectives swooped as he arrived at London's Heathrow Airport on Thursday, Scotland Yard said.
He is currently being held at a west London police station.
The terror threat level in the UK is currently "severe", which means an attack is highly likely. It is the second highest level, below critical. 
Man arrested on suspicion of terrorism offence https://t.co/I18IzjW91T pic.twitter.com/9SItzuoEtV 
â€” Metropolitan Police (@metpoliceuk) February 16, 2017 I n a statement the Metropolitan Police said: "The 36-year-old man was arrested on suspicion of preparation of terrorist acts (contrary section 5 Terrorism Act 2006). 
"He has been taken into custody, under the Police and Criminal Evidence Act (PACE), at a west London police station where he remains at this time.
"Enquiries by detectives continue."
